oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Franklin, Tennessee
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Hand-drawn map of Franklin showing locations of the fort, major streams, roads, and the railroad. The map includes a chronology of action of both Union and Rebel troops near Franklin from March 1862 to December 1864.
James Marsh Morey was a corporal in Company D of the 32nd Regiment of the Tennessee Infantry organized at Franklin in Williamson County.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Maps; United States--History--Civil War, 1861-1865--Maps; Franklin, Battle of, Franklin, Tenn., 1864
